creditline: Gift of Molly Klobe in memory of Winton Jones
description: Kneeling figure resting on PL knee and PR foot, hands together; 3/4 view from PL, back; hair drawn into low bun; figure wears loose garment, gathered at waist
provenance: Family of the artist. [Patrick Roger-Binet, Galerie Coligny, Paris]. [Molly Klobe, Chamberlin Gallery, New York, NY; until 2003; given to Mia]
title: Study of a Female Figure Praying, Kneeling on Left Knee
